name: Vegan Parmesan Cheese - 3 Ways
description: Vegan Parmesan Cheese is a staple you're going to want to keep in your fridge and sprinkle on everything! 3 ways to make it with a nut free option. Ridiculously easy!
recipeIngredient: 1  cup raw cashews, walnuts or pepitas

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a food processor, and pulse until a crumbly consistency is reached. Don't pulse for too long or it will turn into a paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a food processor, and pulse until a crumbly consistency is reached. Don't pulse for too long or it will turn into a paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Store vegan parmesan cheese in the refrigerator for several weeks; it lasts quite a long time. Use it on pizza, pasta, tofu scramble, roasted vegetables and anywhere else you like.
recipeInstructions.name: Store vegan parmesan cheese in the refrigerator for several weeks; it lasts quite a long time. Use it on pizza, pasta, tofu scramble, roasted vegetables and anywhere else you like.

keywords: vegan cheese recipes, vegan parmesan cheese recipe
